cases.title: Hotel Expert Witness Not Allowed to Testify on Plumbing Issues
cases.description: The court ruled that the jury was familiar with clogged drains, and therefore Plaintiff's Hotel & Hospitality Expert Witness could not testify on that issue.

cases.title: Pulmonary Medicine Expert Witness Excluded from Testifying on Heart/Lung Bypass Machine
cases.description: Plaintiff's Pulmonary Medicine Expert Witness lacked the engineering and technical experience to opine on the use of an Air Bubble Detection system.

cases.title: Automotive Expert Witness Allowed to Testify in Post Termination Compensation Case
cases.description: In a contract dispute case, Plaintiff's Automotive Expert Witness could testify on "Life of Parts" compensation to be paid to a terminated employee.
